unnormalised: Ed-Tech Scene Heats Up: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to College?
normalised: Ed-Tech Scene Heats Up: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to College?

unnormalised: Tired of drowning in forms and endless Google searches for scholarships? You're not alone! The ed-tech space is buzzing with scholarship portals aiming to connect bright sparks like you with funding opportunities.
normalised: Tired of drowning in forms and endless Google searches for scholarships? You're not alone! The ed-tech space is buzzing with scholarship portals aiming to connect bright sparks like you with funding opportunities.

unnormalised: Think of them as your personalized biryani of scholarship info – a little bit of everything to suit your taste (and course!).
normalised: Think of them as your personalized biryani of scholarship info – a little bit of everything to suit your taste (and course!).

unnormalised: From covering tuition fees at IIT-Madras to supporting students pursuing art in Shantiniketan, these platforms aggregate scholarships from various sources, streamlining the application process. Many even offer AI-powered matching, suggesting awards you're most likely to snag.
normalised: From covering tuition fees at I I T-Madras to supporting students pursuing art in Shantiniketan, these platforms aggregate scholarships from various sources, streamlining the application process. Many even offer A I-powered matching, suggesting awards you're most likely to snag.

unnormalised: Students like Rohan Sharma from Delhi swear by them, saying they helped him find a Rs. 50,000 scholarship for his engineering degree.
normalised: Students like Rohan Sharma from Delhi swear by them, saying they helped him find a rupee fifty thousand scholarship for his engineering degree.

unnormalised: But remember, do your research! While most portals are legit, always double-check the scholarship provider before sharing your details.
normalised: But remember, do your research! While most portals are legit, always double-check the scholarship provider before sharing your details.

unnormalised: This Onam season, give yourself the gift of a debt-free education! Check out these portals – your dreams might just be one click away. It could be less of a "struggle street" and more of a comfortable highway.
normalised: This Onam season, give yourself the gift of a debt-free education! Check out these portals – your dreams might just be one click away. It could be less of a "struggle street" and more of a comfortable highway.
